title: Ahmed Alshaiba, Yemeni Music Master, Is Dead at 32
description: He taught himself to play the oud, a lutelike stringed instrument, and made a splash on social media with his cover versions of pop songs.
dc:creator: Richard Sandomir
media:credit: Volkan Furuncu/Anadolu Agency, via Getty Images
media:description: Ahmed Alshaiba in 2017. He picked up the oud after his brother lost interest in the instrument, and he went on to become a YouTube star.
